author: Joe Concha
title: Bill Maher defends calling coronavirus 'Chinese virus,' mocks Ted Lieu
description: HBO's Bill Maher on Friday defended calling the novel coronavirus the "Chinese virus," arguing that "pretty liberal" scientists have been "naming diseases after the places they came from for a very long time."The r...
